statements: SELECT * FROM HistoricalBattles;
SELECT battle_name, location, battle_date FROM HistoricalBattles;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalBattles WHERE participant_id = 1001;
SELECT battle_name, outcome FROM HistoricalBattles WHERE battle_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT battle_name, location FROM HistoricalBattles ORDER BY battle_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalBattles WHERE outcome = 'Victory' ORDER BY battle_date DESC;
SELECT battle_name, location FROM HistoricalBattles WHERE participant_id = 100 ORDER BY battle_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM HistoricalBattles WHERE battle_date BETWEEN '1800-01-01' AND '1900-01-01';
SELECT battle_name, location, outcome FROM HistoricalBattles WHERE location LIKE '%Europe%' AND outcome = 'Defeat';
SELECT battle_id, battle_name FROM HistoricalBattles WHERE battle_date >= '2000-01-01' AND participant_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY battle_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_battles;
SELECT battle_name, battle_date FROM historical_battles WHERE battle_date >= '1800-01-01';
SELECT battle_id, battle_name, location FROM historical_battles ORDER BY battle_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name FROM participants WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM historical_battles WHERE location LIKE '%Europe%';
SELECT * FROM historical_battles;
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT battle_name, location FROM historical_battles WHERE battle_date > '1900-01-01';
SELECT p.participant_name, b.battle_name FROM participants p JOIN historical_battles b ON p.battle_id = b.battle_id;
SELECT * FROM historical_battles WHERE location = 'France' OR location = 'Germany';
SELECT * FROM Battles;
SELECT battle_name, battle_date FROM Battles;
SELECT battle_name, outcome FROM Battles WHERE outcome='Victory';
SELECT participant_name, participant_role FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, outcome_description FROM Participants p JOIN Outcomes o ON p.participant_id = o.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM Battles WHERE battle_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, participant_role FROM Participants WHERE battle_id = 2 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT battle_name, battle_date, location FROM Battles WHERE battle_date >= '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY battle_date ASC;
SELECT out.outcome_description, p.participant_name FROM Outcomes out JOIN Participants p ON out.participant_id = p.participant_id WHERE out.outcome_id = 3;

SELECT b.battle_name, p.participant_name, p.participant_role FROM Battles b JOIN Participants p ON b.battle_id = p.battle_id WHERE p.participant_role = 'Commander' ORDER BY b.battle_date DESC, p.participant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_battles;
SELECT battle_name, battle_date, location FROM historical_battles;
SELECT participant_name, army_name, army_size FROM battle_participants WHERE battle_id = 1;
SELECT winning_army, victory_type FROM battle_outcomes WHERE outcome_id = 3;
SELECT battle_id, description, duration_hours, weather_conditions FROM battle_details WHERE battle_id = 2;
SELECT battle_name, location, battle_date FROM historical_battles ORDER BY battle_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM battle_participants WHERE army_size > 5000 ORDER BY participant_name ASC

SELECT b.battle_name, bp.participant_name, bo.victory_type FROM historical_battles b JOIN battle_participants bp ON b.battle_id = bp.battle_id JOIN battle_outcomes bo ON b.battle_id = bo.battle_id WHERE bo.victory_type = 'Decisive Victory'
SELECT bd.battle_id, bd.description, bd.weather_conditions, bo.winning_army FROM battle_details bd LEFT JOIN battle_outcomes bo ON bd.battle_id = bo.battle_id WHERE bd.duration_hours > 10
SELECT * FROM historical_battles WHERE battle_name LIKE '%battle%' AND outcome = 'Victory'
SELECT * FROM battles;
SELECT battle_name, battle_date, location FROM battles WHERE outcome = 'Victory';
SELECT participant_name, role, army_id FROM participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT army_name, total_soldiers FROM armies WHERE total_soldiers > 5000;
SELECT battle_name, battle_date, outcome_description FROM battles b JOIN battles_outcomes bo ON b.battle_id = bo.battle_id;
SELECT * FROM battles;
SELECT battle_name, battle_date, location FROM battles ORDER BY battle_date DESC;
SELECT p.participant_name, b.battle_name, a.army_name FROM participants p JOIN battles b ON p.battle_id = b.battle_id JOIN armies a ON p.army_id = a.army_id;
SELECT b.battle_name, bo.outcome_description FROM battles b JOIN battles_outcomes bo ON b.battle_id = bo.battle_id WHERE bo.outcome_description LIKE '%victory%';
SELECT b.battle_name, p.participant_name, a.commander_name FROM participants p JOIN battles b ON p.battle_id = b.battle_id JOIN armies a ON p.army_id = a.army_id ORDER BY b.battle_date ASC;
